channel.title: 2008 on Tardigrade's dev blog
channel.description: Recent content in 2008 on Tardigrade's dev blog

item.title: [PSP] AntiTetris
item.description: AntiTetris A homebrew game for PSP. AntiTetris is a visual reproduction of the Game Boy Tetris, but based on a physics engine. Lines are not implemented. The aim is to stack up as many tetrominoes as possible before they reach the top of the screen. Download: AntiTetris.zip Source: AntiTetris_src.zip Vid√©o: http://www.dailymotion.com/video/x61qf5_antitetris-psp-homebrew_videogames Credits: Development: Tardigrade Graphics library: JGE++ Physics engine: Chipmunk

item.title: [Nintendo DS] Everlasting Love
item.description: Everlasting Love Homebrew game for the Nintendo DS. Everlasting Love is a combination of a 2D platformer and a rhythm game, in which you have to adjust your jumps using the music. The song is Everlasting Love from the original soundtrack of We Love Katamari. Download: Everlasting.zip / Everlasting_sc.zip / Everlasting_gba.zip How to play : The monkey can move right and left during jumps only. No walking. As soon as he touches a wall, he holds onto it until the next jump.
